00064 /************************* Node Socket Manipulation **************************/
00065 
00066 static void node_tag_recursive(bNode *node)
00067 {
00068     bNodeSocket *input;
00069 
00070     if (!node || (node->flag & NODE_TEST))
00071         return; /* in case of cycles */
00072     
00073     node->flag |= NODE_TEST;
00074 
00075     for (input=node->inputs.first; input; input=input->next)
00076         if (input->link)
00077             node_tag_recursive(input->link->fromnode);
00078 }
00079 
00080 static void node_clear_recursive(bNode *node)
00081 {
00082     bNodeSocket *input;
00083 
00084     if (!node || !(node->flag & NODE_TEST))
00085         return; /* in case of cycles */
00086     
00087     node->flag &= ~NODE_TEST;
00088 
00089     for (input=node->inputs.first; input; input=input->next)
00090         if (input->link)
00091             node_clear_recursive(input->link->fromnode);
00092 }
00093 
00094 static void node_remove_linked(bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *rem_node)
00095 {
00096     bNode *node, *next;
00097     bNodeSocket *sock;
00098 
00099     if (!rem_node)
00100         return;
00101 
00102     /* tag linked nodes to be removed */
00103     for (node=ntree->nodes.first; node; node=node->next)
00104         node->flag &= ~NODE_TEST;
00105     
00106     node_tag_recursive(rem_node);
00107 
00108     /* clear tags on nodes that are still used by other nodes */
00109     for (node=ntree->nodes.first; node; node=node->next)
00110         if (!(node->flag & NODE_TEST))
00111             for (sock=node->inputs.first; sock; sock=sock->next)
00112                 if (sock->link && sock->link->fromnode != rem_node)
00113                     node_clear_recursive(sock->link->fromnode);
00114 
00115     /* remove nodes */
00116     for (node=ntree->nodes.first; node; node=next) {
00117         next = node->next;
00118 
00119         if (node->flag & NODE_TEST) {
00120             if (node->id)
00121                 node->id->us--;
00122             nodeFreeNode(ntree, node);
00123         }
00124     }
00125 }
00126 
00127 /* disconnect socket from the node it is connected to */
00128 static void node_socket_disconnect(Main *bmain, bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node_to, bNodeSocket *sock_to)
00129 {
00130     if (!sock_to->link)
00131         return;
00132 
00133     nodeRemLink(ntree, sock_to->link);
00134 
00135     nodeUpdate(ntree, node_to);
00136     ntreeUpdateTree(ntree);
00137 
00138     ED_node_generic_update(bmain, ntree, node_to);
00139 }
00140 
00141 /* remove all nodes connected to this socket, if they aren't connected to other nodes */
00142 static void node_socket_remove(Main *bmain, bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node_to, bNodeSocket *sock_to)
00143 {
00144     if (!sock_to->link)
00145         return;
00146 
00147     node_remove_linked(ntree, sock_to->link->fromnode);
00148 
00149     nodeUpdate(ntree, node_to);
00150     ntreeUpdateTree(ntree);
00151 
00152     ED_node_generic_update(bmain, ntree, node_to);
00153 }
00154 
00155 /* add new node connected to this socket, or replace an existing one */
00156 static void node_socket_add_replace(Main *bmain, bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node_to, bNodeSocket *sock_to, bNodeTemplate *ntemp, int sock_num)
00157 {
00158     bNode *node_from;
00159     bNodeSocket *sock_from;
00160     bNode *node_prev = NULL;
00161 
00162     /* unlink existing node */
00163     if (sock_to->link) {
00164         node_prev = sock_to->link->fromnode;
00165         nodeRemLink(ntree, sock_to->link);
00166     }
00167 
00168     /* find existing node that we can use */
00169     for (node_from=ntree->nodes.first; node_from; node_from=node_from->next)
00170         if (node_from->type == ntemp->type)
00171             break;
00172 
00173     if (node_from)
00174         if (!(node_from->inputs.first == NULL && !(node_from->typeinfo->flag & NODE_OPTIONS)))
00175             node_from = NULL;
00176 
00177     if (node_prev && node_prev->type == ntemp->type &&
00178         (ntemp->type != NODE_GROUP || node_prev->id == &ntemp->ngroup->id)) {
00179         /* keep the previous node if it's the same type */
00180         node_from = node_prev;
00181     }
00182     else if (!node_from) {
00183         node_from= nodeAddNode(ntree, ntemp);
00184         node_from->locx = node_to->locx - (node_from->typeinfo->width + 50);
00185         node_from->locy = node_to->locy;
00186 
00187         if (node_from->id)
00188             id_us_plus(node_from->id);
00189     }
00190 
00191     nodeSetActive(ntree, node_from);
00192 
00193     /* add link */
00194     sock_from = BLI_findlink(&node_from->outputs, sock_num);
00195     nodeAddLink(ntree, node_from, sock_from, node_to, sock_to);
00196 
00197     /* copy input sockets from previous node */
00198     if (node_prev && node_from != node_prev) {
00199         bNodeSocket *sock_prev, *sock_from;
00200 
00201         for (sock_prev=node_prev->inputs.first; sock_prev; sock_prev=sock_prev->next) {
00202             for (sock_from=node_from->inputs.first; sock_from; sock_from=sock_from->next) {
00203                 if (nodeCountSocketLinks(ntree, sock_from) >= sock_from->limit)
00204                     continue;
00205                 
00206                 if (strcmp(sock_prev->name, sock_from->name) == 0 && sock_prev->type == sock_from->type) {
00207                     bNodeLink *link = sock_prev->link;
00208 
00209                     if (link && link->fromnode) {
00210                         nodeAddLink(ntree, link->fromnode, link->fromsock, node_from, sock_from);
00211                         nodeRemLink(ntree, link);
00212                     }
00213 
00214                     node_socket_free_default_value(sock_from->type, sock_from->default_value);
00215                     sock_from->default_value = node_socket_make_default_value(sock_from->type);
00216                     node_socket_copy_default_value(sock_from->type, sock_from->default_value, sock_prev->default_value);
00217                 }
00218             }
00219         }
00220 
00221         /* also preserve mapping for texture nodes */
00222         if (node_from->typeinfo->nclass == NODE_CLASS_TEXTURE &&
00223            node_prev->typeinfo->nclass == NODE_CLASS_TEXTURE)
00224             memcpy(node_from->storage, node_prev->storage, sizeof(NodeTexBase));
00225 
00226         /* remove node */
00227         node_remove_linked(ntree, node_prev);
00228     }
00229 
00230     nodeUpdate(ntree, node_from);
00231     nodeUpdate(ntree, node_to);
00232     ntreeUpdateTree(ntree);
00233 
00234     ED_node_generic_update(bmain, ntree, node_to);
00235 }

00237 /****************************** Node Link Menu *******************************/
00238 
00239 #define UI_NODE_LINK_ADD        0
00240 #define UI_NODE_LINK_DISCONNECT -1
00241 #define UI_NODE_LINK_REMOVE     -2
00242 
00243 typedef struct NodeLinkArg {
00244     Main *bmain;
00245     Scene *scene;
00246     bNodeTree *ntree;
00247     bNode *node;
00248     bNodeSocket *sock;
00249 
00250     bNodeTree *ngroup;
00251     int type;
00252     int output;
00253 
00254     uiLayout *layout;
00255 } NodeLinkArg;
00256 
00257 static void ui_node_link(bContext *C, void *arg_p, void *event_p)
00258 {
00259     NodeLinkArg *arg = (NodeLinkArg*)arg_p;
00260     Main *bmain = arg->bmain;
00261     bNode *node_to = arg->node;
00262     bNodeSocket *sock_to = arg->sock;
00263     bNodeTree *ntree = arg->ntree;
00264     int event = GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(event_p);
00265     bNodeTemplate ntemp;
00266 
00267     ntemp.type = arg->type;
00268     ntemp.ngroup = arg->ngroup;
00269     ntemp.scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00270     ntemp.main = CTX_data_main(C);
00271 
00272     if (event == UI_NODE_LINK_DISCONNECT)
00273         node_socket_disconnect(bmain, ntree, node_to, sock_to);
00274     else if (event == UI_NODE_LINK_REMOVE)
00275         node_socket_remove(bmain, ntree, node_to, sock_to);
00276     else
00277         node_socket_add_replace(bmain, ntree, node_to, sock_to, &ntemp, arg->output);
00278     
00279     ED_undo_push(C, "Node input modify");
00280 }
00281 
00282 static void ui_node_sock_name(bNodeSocket *sock, char name[UI_MAX_NAME_STR])
00283 {
00284     if (sock->link && sock->link->fromnode) {
00285         bNode *node = sock->link->fromnode;
00286         char node_name[UI_MAX_NAME_STR];
00287 
00288         if (node->type == NODE_GROUP) {
00289             if (node->id)
00290                 BLI_strncpy(node_name, node->id->name+2, UI_MAX_NAME_STR);
00291             else
00292                 BLI_strncpy(node_name, "Group", UI_MAX_NAME_STR);
00293         }
00294         else
00295             BLI_strncpy(node_name, node->typeinfo->name, UI_MAX_NAME_STR);
00296 
00297         if (node->inputs.first == NULL &&
00298            node->outputs.first != node->outputs.last &&
00299            !(node->typeinfo->flag & NODE_OPTIONS))
00300             BLI_snprintf(name, UI_MAX_NAME_STR, "%s | %s", node_name, sock->link->fromsock->name);
00301         else
00302             BLI_strncpy(name, node_name, UI_MAX_NAME_STR);
00303     }
00304     else if (sock->type == SOCK_SHADER)
00305         BLI_strncpy(name, "None", UI_MAX_NAME_STR);
00306     else
00307         BLI_strncpy(name, "Default", UI_MAX_NAME_STR);
00308 }
00309 
00310 static int ui_compatible_sockets(int typeA, int typeB)
00311 {
00312     return (typeA == typeB);
00313 }
00314 
00315 static void ui_node_menu_column(NodeLinkArg *arg, int nclass, const char *cname)
00316 {
00317     Main *bmain = arg->bmain;
00318     bNodeTree *ntree = arg->ntree;
00319     bNodeSocket *sock = arg->sock;
00320     uiLayout *layout = arg->layout;
00321     uiLayout *column = NULL;
00322     uiBlock *block = uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
00323     uiBut *but;
00324     bNodeType *ntype;
00325     bNodeTree *ngroup;
00326     NodeLinkArg *argN;
00327     int first = 1;
00328     int compatibility= 0;
00329 
00330     if (ntree->type == NTREE_SHADER) {
00331         if (scene_use_new_shading_nodes(arg->scene))
00332             compatibility= NODE_NEW_SHADING;
00333         else
00334             compatibility= NODE_OLD_SHADING;
00335     }
00336 
00337     if (nclass == NODE_CLASS_GROUP) {
00338         for (ngroup=bmain->nodetree.first; ngroup; ngroup=ngroup->id.next) {
00339             bNodeSocket *gsock;
00340             char name[UI_MAX_NAME_STR];
00341             int i, j, num = 0;
00342 
00343             if (ngroup->type != ntree->type)
00344                 continue;
00345 
00346             for (gsock=ngroup->inputs.first; gsock; gsock=gsock->next)
00347                 if (ui_compatible_sockets(gsock->type, sock->type))
00348                     num++;
00349 
00350             for (i=0, j=0, gsock=ngroup->outputs.first; gsock; gsock=gsock->next, i++) {
00351                 if (!ui_compatible_sockets(gsock->type, sock->type))
00352                     continue;
00353 
00354                 if (first) {
00355                     column= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 0);
00356                     uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, column);
00357 
00358                     uiItemL(column, cname, ICON_NODE);
00359                     but= block->buttons.last;
00360                     but->flag= UI_TEXT_LEFT;
00361 
00362                     first = 0;
00363                 }
00364 
00365                 if (num > 1) {
00366                     if (j == 0) {
00367                         uiItemL(column, ngroup->id.name+2, ICON_NODE);
00368                         but= block->buttons.last;
00369                         but->flag= UI_TEXT_LEFT;
00370                     }
00371 
00372                     BLI_snprintf(name, UI_MAX_NAME_STR, "  %s", gsock->name);
00373                     j++;
00374                 }
00375                 else
00376                     BLI_strncpy(name, ngroup->id.name+2, UI_MAX_NAME_STR);
00377 
00378                 but = uiDefBut(block, BUT, 0, ngroup->id.name+2, 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X*4, UI_UNIT_Y,
00379                     NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, "Add node to input");
00380 
00381                 argN = MEM_dupallocN(arg);
00382                 argN->type = NODE_GROUP;
00383                 argN->ngroup = ngroup;
00384                 argN->output = i;
00385                 uiButSetNFunc(but, ui_node_link, argN, NULL);
00386             }
00387         }
00388     }
00389     else {
00390         bNodeTreeType *ttype= ntreeGetType(ntree->type);
00391 
00392         for (ntype=ttype->node_types.first; ntype; ntype=ntype->next) {
00393             bNodeSocketTemplate *stemp;
00394             char name[UI_MAX_NAME_STR];
00395             int i, j, num = 0;
00396 
00397             if (compatibility && !(ntype->compatibility & compatibility))
00398                 continue;
00399 
00400             if (ntype->nclass != nclass)
00401                 continue;
00402 
00403             for (i=0, stemp=ntype->outputs; stemp && stemp->type != -1; stemp++, i++)
00404                 if (ui_compatible_sockets(stemp->type, sock->type))
00405                     num++;
00406 
00407             for (i=0, j=0, stemp=ntype->outputs; stemp && stemp->type != -1; stemp++, i++) {
00408                 if (!ui_compatible_sockets(stemp->type, sock->type))
00409                     continue;
00410 
00411                 if (first) {
00412                     column= uiLayoutColumn(layout, 0);
00413                     uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, column);
00414 
00415                     uiItemL(column, cname, ICON_NODE);
00416                     but= block->buttons.last;
00417                     but->flag= UI_TEXT_LEFT;
00418 
00419                     first = 0;
00420                 }
00421 
00422                 if (num > 1) {
00423                     if (j == 0) {
00424                         uiItemL(column, ntype->name, ICON_NODE);
00425                         but= block->buttons.last;
00426                         but->flag= UI_TEXT_LEFT;
00427                     }
00428 
00429                     BLI_snprintf(name, UI_MAX_NAME_STR, "  %s", stemp->name);
00430                     j++;
00431                 }
00432                 else
00433                     BLI_strncpy(name, ntype->name, UI_MAX_NAME_STR);
00434 
00435                 but = uiDefBut(block, BUT, 0, name, 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X*4, UI_UNIT_Y,
00436                     NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, "Add node to input");
00437 
00438                 argN = MEM_dupallocN(arg);
00439                 argN->type = ntype->type;
00440                 argN->output = i;
00441                 uiButSetNFunc(but, ui_node_link, argN, NULL);
00442             }
00443         }
00444     }
00445 }

00447 static void node_menu_column_foreach_cb(void *calldata, int nclass, const char *name)
00448 {
00449     NodeLinkArg *arg = (NodeLinkArg*)calldata;
00450 
00451     if (!ELEM(nclass, NODE_CLASS_GROUP, NODE_CLASS_LAYOUT))
00452         ui_node_menu_column(arg, nclass, name);
00453 }

00455 static void ui_template_node_link_menu(bContext *C, uiLayout *layout, void *but_p)
00456 {
00457     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00458     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00459     uiBlock *block = uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
00460     uiBut *but = (uiBut*)but_p;
00461     uiLayout *split, *column;
00462     NodeLinkArg *arg = (NodeLinkArg*)but->func_argN;
00463     bNodeSocket *sock = arg->sock;
00464     bNodeTreeType *ntreetype= ntreeGetType(arg->ntree->type);
00465 
00466     uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, layout);
00467     split= uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0, 0);
00468 
00469     arg->bmain= bmain;
00470     arg->scene= scene;
00471     arg->layout= split;
00472     
00473     if (ntreetype && ntreetype->foreach_nodeclass)
00474         ntreetype->foreach_nodeclass(scene, arg, node_menu_column_foreach_cb);
00475 
00476     column= uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
00477     uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, column);
00478 
00479     if (sock->link) {
00480         uiItemL(column, "Link", ICON_NONE);
00481         but= block->buttons.last;
00482         but->flag= UI_TEXT_LEFT;
00483 
00484         but = uiDefBut(block, BUT, 0, "Remove", 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X*4, UI_UNIT_Y,
00485             NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, "Remove nodes connected to the input");
00486         uiButSetNFunc(but, ui_node_link, MEM_dupallocN(arg), SET_INT_IN_POINTER(UI_NODE_LINK_REMOVE));
00487 
00488         but = uiDefBut(block, BUT, 0, "Disconnect", 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X*4, UI_UNIT_Y,
00489             NULL, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, "Disconnect nodes connected to the input");
00490         uiButSetNFunc(but, ui_node_link, MEM_dupallocN(arg), SET_INT_IN_POINTER(UI_NODE_LINK_DISCONNECT));
00491     }
00492 
00493     ui_node_menu_column(arg, NODE_CLASS_GROUP, IFACE_("Group"));
00494 }

00496 void uiTemplateNodeLink(uiLayout *layout, bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node, bNodeSocket *sock)
00497 {
00498     uiBlock *block = uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
00499     NodeLinkArg *arg;
00500     uiBut *but;
00501 
00502     arg = MEM_callocN(sizeof(NodeLinkArg), "NodeLinkArg");
00503     arg->ntree = ntree;
00504     arg->node = node;
00505     arg->sock = sock;
00506     arg->type = 0;
00507     arg->output = 0;
00508 
00509     uiBlockSetCurLayout(block, layout);
00510 
00511     if (sock->link || sock->type == SOCK_SHADER || (sock->flag & SOCK_HIDE_VALUE)) {
00512         char name[UI_MAX_NAME_STR];
00513         ui_node_sock_name(sock, name);
00514         but = uiDefMenuBut(block, ui_template_node_link_menu, NULL, name, 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X*4, UI_UNIT_Y, "");
00515     }
00516     else
00517         but = uiDefIconMenuBut(block, ui_template_node_link_menu, NULL, ICON_NONE, 0, 0, UI_UNIT_X, UI_UNIT_Y, "");
00518 
00519     but->type= MENU;
00520     but->flag |= UI_TEXT_LEFT|UI_BUT_NODE_LINK;
00521     but->poin= (char*)but;
00522     but->func_argN = arg;
00523 
00524     if (sock->link && sock->link->fromnode)
00525         if (sock->link->fromnode->flag & NODE_ACTIVE_TEXTURE)
00526             but->flag |= UI_BUT_NODE_ACTIVE;
00527 }

00529 /**************************** Node Tree Layout *******************************/
00530 
00531 static void ui_node_draw_input(uiLayout *layout, bContext *C,
00532     bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node, bNodeSocket *input, int depth);
00533 
00534 static void ui_node_draw_node(uiLayout *layout, bContext *C, bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node, int depth)
00535 {
00536     bNodeSocket *input;
00537     uiLayout *col, *split;
00538     PointerRNA nodeptr;
00539 
00540     RNA_pointer_create(&ntree->id, &RNA_Node, node, &nodeptr);
00541 
00542     if (node->typeinfo->uifunc) {
00543         if (node->type != NODE_GROUP) {
00544             split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.35f, 0);
00545             col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
00546             col = uiLayoutColumn(split, 0);
00547 
00548             node->typeinfo->uifunc(col, C, &nodeptr);
00549         }
00550     }
00551 
00552     for (input=node->inputs.first; input; input=input->next)
00553         ui_node_draw_input(layout, C, ntree, node, input, depth+1);
00554 }
00555 
00556 static void ui_node_draw_input(uiLayout *layout, bContext *C, bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node, bNodeSocket *input, int depth)
00557 {
00558     PointerRNA inputptr;
00559     uiBlock *block = uiLayoutGetBlock(layout);
00560     uiBut *bt;
00561     uiLayout *split, *row, *col;
00562     bNode *lnode;
00563     char label[UI_MAX_NAME_STR];
00564     int indent = (depth > 1)? 2*(depth - 1): 0;
00565     int dependency_loop;
00566 
00567     if (input->flag & SOCK_UNAVAIL)
00568         return;
00569 
00570     /* to avoid eternal loops on cyclic dependencies */
00571     node->flag |= NODE_TEST;
00572     lnode = (input->link)? input->link->fromnode: NULL;
00573 
00574     dependency_loop = (lnode && (lnode->flag & NODE_TEST));
00575     if (dependency_loop)
00576         lnode = NULL;
00577 
00578     /* socket RNA pointer */
00579     RNA_pointer_create(&ntree->id, &RNA_NodeSocket, input, &inputptr);
00580 
00581     /* indented label */
00582     memset(label, ' ', indent);
00583     label[indent] = '\0';
00584     BLI_snprintf(label, UI_MAX_NAME_STR, "%s%s:", label, input->name);
00585 
00586     /* split in label and value */
00587     split = uiLayoutSplit(layout, 0.35f, 0);
00588 
00589     row = uiLayoutRow(split, 1);
00590 
00591     if (depth > 0) {
00592         uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSSN);
00593 
00594         if (lnode && (lnode->inputs.first || (lnode->typeinfo->uifunc && lnode->type != NODE_GROUP))) {
00595             int icon = (input->flag & SOCK_COLLAPSED)? ICON_DISCLOSURE_TRI_RIGHT: ICON_DISCLOSURE_TRI_DOWN;
00596             uiItemR(row, &inputptr, "show_expanded", UI_ITEM_R_ICON_ONLY, "", icon);
00597         }
00598         else
00599             uiItemL(row, "", ICON_BLANK1);
00600 
00601         bt = block->buttons.last;
00602         bt->x2 = UI_UNIT_X/2;
00603 
00604         uiBlockSetEmboss(block, UI_EMBOSS);
00605     }
00606 
00607     uiItemL(row, label, ICON_NONE);
00608     bt= block->buttons.last;
00609     bt->flag= UI_TEXT_LEFT;
00610 
00611     if (dependency_loop) {
00612         row = uiLayoutRow(split, 0);
00613         uiItemL(row, "Dependency Loop", ICON_ERROR);
00614     }
00615     else if (lnode) {
00616         /* input linked to a node */
00617         uiTemplateNodeLink(split, ntree, node, input);
00618 
00619         if (!(input->flag & SOCK_COLLAPSED)) {
00620             if (depth == 0)
00621                 uiItemS(layout);
00622 
00623             ui_node_draw_node(layout, C, ntree, lnode, depth);
00624         }
00625     }
00626     else {
00627         /* input not linked, show value */
00628         if (input->type != SOCK_SHADER && !(input->flag & SOCK_HIDE_VALUE)) {
00629             if (input->type == SOCK_VECTOR) {
00630                 row = uiLayoutRow(split, 0);
00631                 col = uiLayoutColumn(row, 0);
00632 
00633                 uiItemR(col, &inputptr, "default_value", 0, "", 0);
00634             }
00635             else {
00636                 row = uiLayoutRow(split, 1);
00637                 uiItemR(row, &inputptr, "default_value", 0, "", 0);
00638             }
00639         }
00640         else
00641             row = uiLayoutRow(split, 0);
00642 
00643         uiTemplateNodeLink(row, ntree, node, input);
00644     }
00645 
00646     /* clear */
00647     node->flag &= ~NODE_TEST;
00648 }
00649 
00650 void uiTemplateNodeView(uiLayout *layout, bContext *C, bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node, bNodeSocket *input)
00651 {
00652     bNode *tnode;
00653 
00654     if (!ntree)
00655         return;
00656 
00657     /* clear for cycle check */
00658     for (tnode=ntree->nodes.first; tnode; tnode=tnode->next)
00659         tnode->flag &= ~NODE_TEST;
00660 
00661     if (input)
00662         ui_node_draw_input(layout, C, ntree, node, input, 0);
00663     else
00664         ui_node_draw_node(layout, C, ntree, node, 0);
00665 }
